title: The Product
text: Box of Hope currently has all the core features implemented! If you forget your mask at home, you will get a notification; NFC scanning of the mask when it is placed in the box to identify the mask; UV-C disinfection of the mask each time it is placed into the box; and usage tracking with live status of the box available via a web app. Feel free to get in touch or fork the project on GitHub if you have any improvements in mind.
